#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{           int test;
            cin>>test;
            while(test--)
            {   int size;
                cin>>size;
                int col[size];
                int row[size];
                int a[size][size];
                int flagr=0,flagc=0;
                int posr,posc,i,j;
                for(i=0;i<size;i++)
                {   row[i]=0;
                    for(j=0;j<size;j++)
                  {cin>>a[i][j];
                   row[i]=row[i]+a[i][j];
                   }
                }
                for(j=0;j<size;j++)
                {   col[j]=0;
                    for(i=0;i<size;i++)
                     col[j]=col[j]+a[i][j];
                }
                    for(i=0;i<size;i++)
                     {if((col[i]%2)!=0)
                            { flagc++;
                              posc=i;
                            }
                     }
                     for(i=0;i<size;i++)
                     {if((row[i]%2)!=0)
                            { flagr++;
                              posr=i;
                            }
                     }
                     if(flagc==0 && flagr==0)
                     cout<<"1\n";
                     else if(flagc==1 && flagr==1)
                     cout<<"("<<posr+1<<","<<posc+1<<")\n";
                     else
                     cout<<"0\n";
            }
            return 0;
}
